# 大灵之药

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/daling-zhiyao
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/daling-zhiyao
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install daling-zhiyao
daling-zhiyao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g daling-zhiyao
daling-zhiyao <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
